"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a09a4c6368722e260004b7#post_55a09a4c6368722e260004b7
Geckos eat bugs, which means less bugs to bother you.
So your pest problem is being handled naturally by geckos. 
Same with spiders

I hate spiders but I don't go outside and kill them for no reason

"@Meresflut":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a09ba063687242a7001ea4#post_55a09ba063687242a7001ea4
First, find an image link. The source image, not where the image is.
Second, place a exclamation mark (!) at either side, without spaces.

And done!

topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
I've been thinking on things: no offense to anyone, but I should probably listen to certain people here less cause their priorities are way fucking assbackwards.

What do I mean by this:
I actually shouldn't be on as much as I am normally cause I'm going to be job searching pretty soon, I'm working on transitioning, I have to learn Java and C# by myself and not with school cause I screwed up and now financial aid won't cover it so now I have to learn this crap at home.

My priorities:
School/work/transitioning > paying off my debts > family > cleaning the house and cooking >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> anime/video games


What some people's priorities seem to be here:
Anime/video games >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> everything else


No offense to anyone, but for those of you that still live with your parents and they pay the bills you're going to have a rude ass awakening when you turn 18.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
